Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^orange;Kevin^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

I need to dress a pleasure doll to look exactly like ^green;a coworkers mother^reset;... Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset;? on a ^green;Sewing Wheel^reset;? I suck at sewing, and I'll pay you. Shh!
Now for phase two! He'll never see it coming! Thanks for the help. Take this awesome briefcase. Don't open it here, or everyone will get ^green;super jealous^reset; and try to steal it. Trust me.

Texts.Chs: 他们为什么这么讨厌凯文？
